attributes.action: make it mandatory to show width and height restriction signs on roads in metric units.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
For many years it has been optional to show metric height and widths on signs so long as imperial units are also used, however recently it seems to be the norm that new signs are appearing which only show imperial units.

All children in the UK have been educated in metric since 1974, most car handbooks now only show sizes in metric and we have a growing number of drivers from outside of the UK and many in the UK who regularly drive abroad so a growing number of our drivers would more easily understand metric signs.
